<td style="vertical-align:bottom">&#160;</td>
<td style=" text-align: center;margin:auto; vertical-align:top"><ix:nonNumeric name="dei:TradingSymbol" contextRef="duration_2024-05-04_to_2024-05-04" id="ixv-388">ALOT</ix:nonNumeric></td>

<td style=" text-align: center;margin:auto; vertical-align:top"><ix:nonNumeric name="dei:SecurityExchangeName" contextRef="duration_2024-05-04_to_2024-05-04" format="ixt-sec:exchnameen" id="ixv-389">NASDAQ Global Market</ix:nonNumeric></td></tr></table> <p style="margin-top:8pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Indicate by check mark whether the registrant is an emerging growth company as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act of 1933 (&#167;230.405 of this chapter) or Rule <span style="white-space:nowrap">12b-2</span> of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 <span style="white-space:nowrap">(&#167;240.12b-2</span> of this chapter).</p> <p style="margin-top:8pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman;text-align:right">Emerging growth company&#8194;<ix:nonNumeric name="dei:EntityEmergingGrowthCompany" contextRef="duration_2024-05-04_to_2024-05-04" format="ixt-sec:boolballotbox" id="ixv-390">&#9744;</ix:nonNumeric></p> <p style="margin-top:8pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&#160;13(a) of the Exchange Act.&#8194;&#9744;</p> <p style="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&#160;</p> <p style="line-height:1.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;border-bottom:1px solid #000000">&#160;</p> <p style="line-height:3.0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:2pt;border-bottom:1px solid #000000">&#160;</p></div></div>

<hr style="color:#999999;height:3px;width:100%"/>

<div style="text-align:center"><div style="width:8.5in;text-align:left;margin-left: auto;margin-right: auto">

<table style="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt;border:0;width:100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid">
<td style="width:11%;vertical-align:top" align="left"><span style="font-weight:bold">Item&#8201;1.01</span></td>
<td align="left" style="vertical-align:top"> <p style=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:bold;text-align:left">Entry into a Material Definitive Agreement </p></td></tr></table> <p style="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">On May&#160;4, 2024, AstroNova, Inc. (the &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline">Company</span>&#8221;) as &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline">First Guarantor</span>&#8221;, along with its wholly-owned Portugal Subsidiary, AstroNova Portugal, Unipessoal, Lda (the &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline">Purchaser</span>&#8221;) entered into a&#160;Share&#160;Purchase&#160;Agreement&#160;(the &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline">Purchase Agreement</span>&#8221;) with Effort Premier Solutions Lda., a private limited company incorporated under the laws of Portugal (the &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline">Seller</span>&#8221;) and El&#243;i Serafim Alves Ferreira, as the &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline">Second Guarantor</span>&#8221;. </p> <p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">In accordance with the terms and subject to the conditions set forth in the Purchase Agreement, the Purchaser acquired 100% of the issued and outstanding share capital of MTEX New Solution, S.A., a joint stock company with limited liability incorporated under the laws of Portugal (&#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline">MTEX</span>&#8221;), from the Seller in exchange for the Purchase Price as discussed below. The closing date for the acquisition was May&#160;6, 2024. </p> <p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The base purchase price for the acquisition consists of EUR 17,268,345 paid by the Purchaser to the Seller on the closing date by wire transfer, and up to an additional EUR 731,655 retained by the Purchaser to secure certain indemnification obligations of the Seller to be released by the Purchaser subject to resolution of such obligations. Additionally, the Seller will be entitled to receive contingent consideration in an amount of up to EUR 4,000,000 if MTEX meets certain revenue objectives as set forth in the Purchase Agreement for the three calendar year periods ending after the closing date. </p> <p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The Purchase Agreement contains customary representations and warranties made by the Seller and the Purchaser, and also contains certain post-closing obligations, including indemnification obligations by Seller. </p> <p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Also on May&#160;4, 2024, the Purchaser, the Seller, the Second Guarantor and MTEX entered into a Transitional Management Agreement (the &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline">Transitional Management Agreement</span>&#8221;) pursuant to which the Second Guarantor will serve as the MTEX&#8217;s Chief Executive Officer for a term of three years following the closing date. Under the terms of the Transitional Management Agreement, the Second Guarantor will receive a salary and grant of restricted stock units and will be entitled to participate in the Company&#8217;s incentive compensation programs on the same terms as the Company&#8217;s executive officers. The Transitional Management Agreement includes customary <span style="white-space:nowrap">non-competition</span> and confidentiality provisions. </p> <p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The foregoing description of the Purchase Agreement, the Transitional Management Agreement and the transactions contemplated thereby does not purport to be complete and is qualified in its entirety by reference to the Purchase Agreement and the Transitional Management Agreement, which are filed as Exhibits 2.1 and 10.1, respectively, to this Current Report on <span style="white-space:nowrap">Form&#160;8-K&#160;and</span> are incorporated by reference herein. The Purchase Agreement and the Transitional Management Agreement have been included to provide investors and securityholders with information regarding their respective terms. They are not intended to provide any other factual information about MTEX, the Seller, the Second Guarantor, the Purchaser or the Company. The Purchase Agreement contains representations and warranties of the Seller, on the one hand, and the Purchaser, on the other hand, made solely for the benefit of the other. Moreover, certain representations and warranties in the Purchase Agreement were used for the purpose of allocating risk between the Seller, on the one hand, and the Purchaser, on the other hand. Accordingly, investors and securityholders should not rely on the representations and warranties in the Purchase Agreement as characterizations of the actual state of facts or condition of MTEX, the Seller, the Purchaser, or their respective subsidiaries or affiliates. Moreover, information concerning the subject matter of the representations, warranties and covenants may change after the date of the Purchase Agreement, which subsequent information may or may not be fully reflected in public disclosures. </p> <p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The information set forth in Item 2.03 below is incorporated herein by reference. </p> <p style="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&#160;</p>
<table style="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt;border:0;width:100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr style="page-break-inside:avoid">
<td style="width:11%;vertical-align:top" align="left"><span style="font-weight:bold">Item&#8201;2.03</span></td>
<td align="left" style="vertical-align:top"> <p style=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:bold;text-align:left">Creation of a Direct Financial Obligation or an Obligation under an <span style="white-space:nowrap">Off-Balance</span> Sheet Arrangement of a Registrant. </p></td></tr></table> <p style="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">On May&#160;6, 2024, the Company entered a Third Amendment to Amended and Restated Credit Agreement (the &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline">Amendment</span>&#8221;) with Bank of America, N.A., as lender (the &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline">Lender</span>&#8221;). The Amendment amended the Amended and Restated Credit Agreement dated as of July&#160;30, 2020, as amended by the First Amendment to Credit Agreement, dated as of March&#160;24, 2021, the LIBOR Transition Amendment, dated as of December&#160;14, 2021, and the Second Amendment to Credit Agreement dated as of August&#160;4, 2022, the Joinder Agreement relating to the Company&#8217;s subsidiary Astro Machine Corporation (&#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline">Astro Machine</span>&#8221;) dated as of August&#160;26, 2022 (the &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline">Existing Credit Agreement</span>&#8221;; the Existing Credit Agreement as amended by the Amendment, the &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline">Amended Credit Agreement</span>&#8221;), between the Company as borrower, Astro Machine as a guarantor, and the Lender. </p>
 <p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&#160;</p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman;text-align:center">2 </p>

</div></div>



<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always"> </p>
<hr style="color:#999999;height:3px;width:100%"/>

<div style="text-align:center"><div style="width:8.5in;text-align:left;margin-left: auto;margin-right: auto">
 <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The Amended Credit Agreement provides for (i)&#160;a new term loan to the Company in the principal amount of EUR 14,000,000 (the &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline">Term <span style="white-space:nowrap">A-2</span> Loan</span>&#8221;), which term loan is in addition to the existing term loan (the &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline">Existing Term Loan</span>&#8221;) outstanding under the Existing Credit Agreement in the principal amount of approximately $12.3&#160;million as of the effective date of the Amendment, and (ii)&#160;an increase in the aggregate principal amount of the revolving credit facility available to the Company from $25,000,000 to $30,000,000 until January&#160;31, 2025, upon and after which the aggregate principal amount of the revolving credit facility will reduce to $25,000,000. At the closing of the Amendment, the Company borrowed the entire EUR 14,000,000 Term <span style="white-space:nowrap">A-2</span> Loan and EUR 3,000,000 and a US dollar amount which was converted to Euros to satisfy the entire purchase price payable on the closing date pursuant to the Purchase Agreement. The revolving credit facility may otherwise be used for general corporate purposes. </p> <p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Under the Amended Credit Agreement, revolving credit loans may continue to be borrowed, at the Company&#8217;s option, in U.S. Dollars or, subject to certain conditions, Euros, British Pounds, Canadian Dollars or Danish Kroner. </p> <p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The Amended Credit Agreement requires that the Term <span style="white-space:nowrap">A-2</span> Loan be paid in quarterly installments on the last day of each fiscal quarter of the Company through April&#160;30, 2027 in the principal amount of EUR 583,333 each, and the entire then-remaining principal balance of the Term <span style="white-space:nowrap">A-2</span> Loan is required to be paid on August&#160;4, 2027. The Amended Credit Agreement requires that the remaining balance of the Existing Term Loan be paid in quarterly installments on the last day of each fiscal quarter of the Company through April&#160;30, 2027 in the principal amount of $675,000 each, and the entire then-remaining principal balance of the term loan is required to be paid on August&#160;4, 2027. The Company may voluntarily prepay the Term <span style="white-space:nowrap">A-2</span> Term Loan or the Existing Term Loan, in whole or in part, from time to time without premium or penalty (other than customary breakage costs, if applicable). The Company may repay borrowings under the revolving credit facility at any time without premium or penalty (other than customary breakage costs, if applicable), but in any event no later than August&#160;4, 2027, and any outstanding revolving loans thereunder will be due and payable in full, and the remainder of the revolving credit facility will terminate, on such date. The Company may reduce or terminate the revolving line of credit at any time, subject to certain thresholds and conditions, without premium or penalty. </p> <p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">As under the Existing Credit Agreement, the loans under the Amended Credit Agreement are subject to certain mandatory prepayments, subject to various exceptions, from (a)&#160;net cash proceeds from certain dispositions of property, (b)&#160;net cash proceeds from certain issuances of equity, (c)&#160;net cash proceeds from certain issuances of additional debt and (d)&#160;net cash proceeds from certain extraordinary receipts. </p> <p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Amounts repaid under the revolving credit facility may be reborrowed, subject to continued compliance with the Amended Credit Agreement. No amount of the Term <span style="white-space:nowrap">A-2</span> Loan or the Existing Term Loan that is repaid may be reborrowed. </p> <p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The Term <span style="white-space:nowrap">A-2</span> Loan bears interest at a rate per annum equal to the EURIBOR rate as defined in the Amended Credit Agreement, plus a margin that varies within a range of 1.60% to 2.50% based on the Company&#8217;s consolidated leverage ratio. The Existing Term Loan and revolving credit loans bear interest at a rate per annum equal to, at the Company&#8217;s option, either (a)&#160;the Term SOFR rate as defined in the Amended Credit Agreement (or, in the case of revolving credit loans denominated in Euros or another currency other than U.S. Dollars, the applicable quoted rate), plus a margin that varies within a range of 1.60% to 2.50% based on the Company&#8217;s consolidated leverage ratio, or (b)&#160;a fluctuating reference rate equal to the highest of (i)&#160;the federal fund rate plus 0.50%, (ii) Bank of America&#8217;s publicly announced prime rate, (iii)&#160;the Term SOFR Rate plus 1.00%, or (iv) 0.50%, plus a margin that varies within a range of 0.60% to 1.50% based on the Company&#8217;s consolidated leverage ratio. In addition to certain other fees and expenses are required to be paid by the Company to the Lender, the Company is required to pay a commitment fee on the undrawn portion of the revolving credit facility that varies within a range of 0.15% and 0.35% based on the Company&#8217;s consolidated leverage ratio. </p> <p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The Company must comply with various customary financial and <span style="white-space:nowrap">non-financial</span> covenants under the Amended Credit Agreement. The financial covenants under the Amended Credit Agreement consist of a maximum consolidated leverage ratio and a minimum consolidated fixed charge coverage ratio, certain of the provisions of which were modified by the Amendment; the minimum consolidated asset coverage ratio under the Existing Credit Agreement was eliminated by the Amendment. The primary <span style="white-space:nowrap">non-financial</span> covenants limit the Company&#8217;s and its subsidiaries&#8217; ability to incur future indebtedness, to place liens on assets, to pay dividends or distributions on their </p>
 <p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&#160;</p> <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman;text-align:center">3 </p>

</div></div>



<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always"> </p>
<hr style="color:#999999;height:3px;width:100%"/>

<div style="text-align:center"><div style="width:8.5in;text-align:left;margin-left: auto;margin-right: auto">
 <p style="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">
capital stock, to repurchase or acquire their capital stock, to conduct mergers or acquisitions, to sell assets, to alter their capital structure, to make investments and loans, to change the nature of their business, and to prepay subordinated indebtedness, in each case subject to certain exceptions and thresholds as set forth in the Amended Credit Agreement, certain of which provisions were modified by the Amendment. </p> <p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The Lender is entitled to accelerate repayment of the loans and to terminate its revolving credit commitment under the Amended Credit Agreement upon the occurrence of any of various customary events of default, which include, among other events, the following (which are subject, in some cases, to certain grace periods): failure to pay when due any principal, interest or other amounts in respect of the loans, breach of any of the Company&#8217;s covenants or representations under the loan documents, default under any other of the Company&#8217;s or its subsidiaries&#8217; significant indebtedness agreements, a bankruptcy, insolvency or similar event with respect to the Company or any of its subsidiaries, a significant unsatisfied judgment against the Company or any of its subsidiaries, or a change of control of the Company. </p> <p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The Company&#8217;s obligations under the Amended Credit Agreement continue to be secured by substantially all of the personal property assets of the Company (including a pledge of the equity interests held by the Company in its subsidiaries ANI ApS, AstroNova GmbH, AstroNova SAS and the Purchaser), subject to certain exceptions, and by a mortgage on the Company&#8217;s owned real property in West Warwick, Rhode Island, and are guaranteed by, and secured by substantially all of the personal property assets, of Astro Machine.<span style="font-weight:bold"><span style="font-style:italic"> </span></span> </p> <p style="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The forgoing description of the terms of the Amendment does not purport to be complete and is qualified in its entirety by reference to the full text of the Amendment, a copy of which is filed herewith as Exhibit 10.2 to this Current Report on <span style="white-space:nowrap">Form&#160;8-K.</span> </p> <p style="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&#160;</p>

<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>EX-2.1</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE" STYLE="line-height:Normal">

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="right"><B>Exhibit 2.1 </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B><I>Certain identified information has been omitted from this exhibit because it is not material and of the type that the </I></B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B><I>registrant treats as private or confidential. [***] indicates that information has been omitted. </I></B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:24pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>SHARE PURCHASE AGREEMENT </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">for the sale and purchase of 100% of </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">the issued and outstanding shares </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">in </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B><U>MTEX NEW SOLUTION
S.A</U>. </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">Between </P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>A<SMALL>STRO</SMALL>N<SMALL>OVA</SMALL> P<SMALL>ORTUGAL</SMALL>, U<SMALL>NIPESSOAL</SMALL>, L<SMALL>DA</SMALL>. </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B><I>as Purchaser </I></B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>and
A<SMALL>STRO</SMALL>N<SMALL>OVA</SMALL> , I<SMALL>NC</SMALL>. </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B><I>as First Guarantor </I></B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>- AND - </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>E<SMALL>FFORT</SMALL> P<SMALL>REMIER</SMALL> S<SMALL>OLUTIONS</SMALL> L<SMALL>DA</SMALL> </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B><I>as Seller </I></B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>- AND -
</B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B>E<SMALL>L&Oacute;I</SMALL> S<SMALL>ERAFIM</SMALL> A<SMALL>LVES</SMALL> F<SMALL>ERREIRA</SMALL></B><B><I><SMALL></SMALL> </I></B><B>
</B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center"><B><I>as Second Guarantor </I></B></P>

STYLE="font-size:75%; vertical-align:top">th</SUP> 2024 </B></P>

AGREEMENT</B> is made on May 4<SUP STYLE="font-size:75%; vertical-align:top">th</SUP> 2024, </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B>BETWEEN</B>: </P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B>WHEREAS</B>: </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(A)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">MTEX NEW SOLUTION, S.A., a joint stock company with limited liability, incorporated under the laws of Portugal

736.850,00, (the &#147;<B>Company</B>&#148;), carries on the Business (as such term is hereinafter defined); </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Seller has full title, free and clear of any lien or encumbrance or any other third-party rights, over 100%
of the nominative shares in the Company, being 147370 shares with a nominal value of EUR 5,00 each, constituting the entire issued and outstanding share capital of the Company (the &#147;<B>Company Shares</B>&#148;); </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

of EUR 136.625,00 and as ancillary capital contributions (<I>presta&ccedil;&otilde;es acess&oacute;rias de capital</I>) the global amount of EUR 7.301.367,00, both with no interest outstanding (<I>juros vencidos</I>) (hereinafter, the
&#147;<B>Credits</B>&#148;); </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Purchaser wishes to acquire full clear title to the Company Shares and the Credits and, consequently, to
gain control over the activities of the Company and the Seller is willing to transfer such Company Shares and Credits to the Purchaser in such conditions; </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Parties state expressly that the purchase of the Company Shares is accomplished, and the Purchase Price has
been established in view of the value of the Company, its current amount of Debt and other essential elements of the transaction. Specifically, it would not have been possible to reach an agreement for the purchase of the Company Shares if the
Seller had not (a)&nbsp;made the Representations and Warranties subject to the terms and conditions provided in this Agreement, (b)&nbsp;assumed certain obligations under the Agreement, and (c)&nbsp;executed the no competition undertaking;
</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(H)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">In addition to the foregoing, the Parties acknowledge that it is has been a true condition of this transaction
the good faith conviction passed on by the Seller to ANI PT that all Key Employees (as defined below) will remain in their respective offices for a long lasting period after the acquisition of the shares of the Company by ANI PT and that such
acquisition does not create, by itself, any disruption in both their commitment with the achievement of the Company&#146;s strategic objectives and their motivation to improve the Company&#146;s economical activities; </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">- 2 - </P>

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(I)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">Each Party has obtained all necessary approvals and consents in respect of the entering into this Agreement and
the transactions thereunder. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">In view of the above, the Seller wishes to sell and the Purchaser wishes to purchase the Company Shares
upon and subject to the terms and conditions of this share purchase agreement (the &#147;<B>Agreement</B>&#148;). </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B>IT IS AGREED </B>as follows: </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>1.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><B><U>INTERPRETATION</U> </B></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">1.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">This Agreement shall be interpreted in accordance with the special provisions set forth in this clause and in
this Agreement and, for any matters which are not expressly contemplated herein, the general interpretation provisions set forth in the Portuguese Civil Code shall apply. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">1.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">In addition to terms defined elsewhere in this Agreement, the definitions and other provisions in Schedule 1.2
apply throughout this Agreement unless a different intention clearly appears. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">1.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">Where any representation or warranty contained in this Agreement is qualified by reference to the
&#147;Knowledge of the Seller&#148; or to any similar expression, it will be deemed to refer to the knowledge of the directors of the Seller and of the Company and/or the knowledge that such persons should have if acting diligently, namely the
Second Guarantor, Mr.&nbsp;Jorge Costa and Mr.&nbsp;Filipe Vieira, after due and careful enquiry. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">1.4</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The headings used in this Agreement do not affect its interpretation. Unless something in the subject matter or
context is inconsistent therewith, references herein to Sections are to sections of this Agreement. The terms &#147;this Agreement&#148;, &#147;hereof&#148;, &#147;hereunder&#148; and similar expressions refer to this Agreement and include any
agreement supplemental hereto. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">1.5</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">In this Agreement, the singular shall include the plural and <I>vice versa</I> and references to words
importing one gender will include both genders. The word &#147;including&#148;, is to be construed to refer to all other terms or matters that could reasonably fall within the broadest possible scope of such general statement, term or matter,
whether or not <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-limiting</FONT> language (such as &#147;without limitation&#148; or &#147;but not limited to&#148;) is used with reference thereto. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">- 3 - </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always"> </p>
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">1.6</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">Unless otherwise expressly provided herein, any agreement, plan, instrument, law, legal provision or statute
defined or referred to herein, or in any agreement or instrument that is referred to herein, means such agreement, plan, instrument, law, legal provision or statute as may be from time to time amended, modified or supplemented.
</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">1.7</TD>

 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">- 4 - </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always"> </p>
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>2.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><B><U>PURPOSE: PURCHASE AND SALE</U> </B></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B></B>2.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><B><U>Purchase and</U><U> Sale</U> </B></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Subject to the terms and conditions set out in this Agreement, the Purchaser hereby purchases and the Seller hereby sells the Company Shares
and the Credits, with full title, free and clear from any Encumbrances<I> </I>with all rights and privileges now or hereinafter attached or pertaining thereto, acquiring therefore, subject to the mentioned terms and provisions, the Business. </P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B></B>2.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><B><U>Purchase Price</U><U> Principles</U> </B></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Subject to any adjustment pursuant to the terms of Section&nbsp;7.2, the purchase price for the Company Shares and Credits (the
&#147;<B>Purchase Price</B>&#148;) corresponds to the sum of the following components: </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(a)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><U>Purchase Price Fixed Amount</U>: </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The amount of EUR 18.000.000,00 corresponds to: </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="9%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(i)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">EUR 10.517.682,77 regarding the sale of the Company Shares; plus </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="9%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(ii)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">EUR 7.482.317,23 regarding the sale of the Credits. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(b)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><U><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Earn-Out</FONT> Payment:</U> </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">A variable/contingent amount calculated in an <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">earn-out</FONT> basis, up to EUR 4.000.000,00, pursuant to the
mechanism set forth in Section&nbsp;2.5 below. <U></U> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">&#167; For the sake of clarity, any payment due under the Earnout Payment concept
will be considered an increase of the Purchase Price referred to in 2.2 (a)(i) above. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B></B>2.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><B></B>The Purchase Price shall be paid as follows:<B> </B></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(a)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">an amount of EUR 17.268.344,70 (the &#147;<B>Closing Payment</B>&#148;) will be paid by the Purchaser to the
Seller on the Closing Date by wire transfer to the Seller&#146;s bank account with [***]; </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

subject to provisions of Section&nbsp;2.4 and 2.6, will be paid by the Purchaser to the Seller on the Holdback Release Dates by wire transfer and in accordance with the written instructions provided by the Seller to the Purchaser; and
</P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">- 5 - </P>

</DIV></Center>

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">

<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(c)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">the <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Earn-out</FONT> Payments (as hereinafter defined in Section&nbsp;2.5), if
any, which may become payable in accordance with the terms of Sections 2.5, and subject to provisions of Section&nbsp;2.7. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">Without prejudice to any adjustment that may be made to the Purchase Price under the terms of this Agreement, the Purchase Price is considered
specified and determined. </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">&#167; In case the funds described in 2.3 (a) are not received in the Seller&#146;s Account until May 10<SUP
STYLE="font-size:75%; vertical-align:top">th</SUP>, 2024, for a reason not attributable to the Seller, this Agreement shall be deemed null and void and the Parties undertake to carry out all actions necessary to revert any contractual and legal
effects resulting from this Agreement. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B></B>2.4</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><B><U><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Earn-out</FONT> Payments</U> </B></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(a)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The mechanism set forth in this Section&nbsp;2.5 rests upon the assumption and expectation that the Company
will, during the financial years 2024, 2025 and 2026, grow product revenue demonstrating substantial progress toward the revenue objectives in the plans and forecasts agreed by the Parties. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(b)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">As additional consideration for the transfer of the Company Shares, free from any Encumbrances, pursuant to
this Agreement, Purchaser shall pay the Seller the following amounts, subject to the conditions described below: </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="9%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(i)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><U>First <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Earn-Out</FONT></U>: an amount of EUR 1.000.000,00 will be paid on a <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">pro-rata</FONT> basis if the Company&#146;s Annual Product Revenue increases by EUR [***], from a base measurement (&#147;<B>Base</B>&#148;) of EUR [***] to a target measurement (&#147;<B>Target</B>&#148;) of EUR [***],
measured for the full fiscal year of 2024. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="9%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(ii)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><U>Second <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Earn-Out</FONT></U>: an amount of EUR 1.500.000,00 will be paid on a
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">pro-rata</FONT> basis if the Company&#146;s Annual Product Revenue increases by EUR [***], from a base measurement of EUR [***] to a target measurement of EUR [***], measured for the full fiscal year of 2025.
</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="9%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(iii)</TD>

STYLE="white-space:nowrap">pro-rata</FONT> basis if the Company&#146;s Annual Product Revenue increases by EUR [***], from a base measurement of EUR [***] to a target measurement of EUR [***], measured for the full fiscal year of 2026.
</P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">- 6 - </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always"> </p>
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><B>&#167;</B><B><I> exemplificative note, for interpretation purposes:</I></B><B> </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><I>If the Company&#146;s audited statutory financials for fiscal year 2024 evidences an Annual Product Revenue of EUR [***] or more, the First <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Earn-Out</FONT> is due. If such Annual Product Revenue is at or below the Base amount, the First <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Earn-Out</FONT> is not due. If Annual Product Revenue for fiscal year 2024 is between the
Base and Target Annual Product Revenue amounts, the amount of the First <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Earn-Out</FONT> shall be proportionate, calculated on a percentage basis, with the increase in turnover between Base and Target turnover
amounts. </I></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:9%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman"><I>For the following two fiscal years of 2025 and 2026, the same mechanism shall apply. </I></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(c)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The First <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Earn-Out</FONT> will be paid in cash by the Purchaser to the Seller
no later than 90 days after the filing of the audited accounts regarding the fiscal year of 2024, the Second <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Earn-Out</FONT> will be paid in cash by the Purchaser to the Seller no later than 90 days after the filing
of the audited accounts regarding the fiscal year of 2025 and the Third <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Earn-Out</FONT> will be paid in cash by the Purchaser to the Seller no later than 90 days after the filing of the audited accounts regarding the
fiscal year of 2026. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(d)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The payment of a respective <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Earn-out</FONT> Payment by the Purchaser will be
subject to the Purchaser&#146;s right to withhold and <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">set-off</FONT> in accordance with the provisions of Section&nbsp;2.7. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(e)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Purchaser shall use good faith business judgment relating to the continued development, marketing,
servicing and contracting with respect to the products and services provided by the Company to its clients. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(f)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Purchaser makes no representation or warranty whatsoever that any of the
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Earn-out</FONT> Payments will actually be achieved. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(g)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">For the sake of clarity, the <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Earn-out</FONT> Payments set forth above may
correspond to the maximum amount or only to a portion of such amount, depending on the <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">pro-rata</FONT> calculations described in letter (b)&nbsp;above. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B></B>2.5</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><B></B><U></U><B><U>Holdback Amount </U> </B></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(a)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">According with the information disclosed by the Seller, the Company is a party in the legal proceedings
described in Schedule 2.5.(a), which may cause the Company to disburse up to the global amount of <B>EUR 731.655,30</B> which includes legal costs and legal interests at the statutory commercial rate calculated up to this Closing Date (<I>juros de
mora comerciais</I>) (&#147;<B>Holdback Amount</B>&#148;). </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(b)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Parties agree that ANI PT will retain from the Purchase Price the Holdback Amount, which shall be released
and paid to the Seller within 10 working days after the date where the relevant final judicial decisions become not subject to appeal (<I>data do tr&acirc;nsito em julgado da decis&atilde;o</I>) regarding the respective legal
</P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">- 7 - </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always"> </p>
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="9%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top">
proceedings, in case the Company is judicially acquitted from the contingency(ies) in question (&#147;<B>Holdback Release Dates</B>&#148;). For the sake of clarity, the Holdback Amount will be
partially released in a <I>pari passu</I> basis with the acquittance on the several legal proceedings, totally or partially, depending on whether the judicial decision not subject to appeal (<I>decis&atilde;o transitada em julgado</I>) represents a
total or partial acquittance. </TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(c)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Seller shall be liable for indemnify ANI PT for the difference between all and any amounts the Company is
convicted to pay to the respective opponents in the legal proceedings referred to above, as well as for all related court and legal representation costs, and the Holdback Amount. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(d)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">ANI PT undertakes to pay the Seller any net amounts that the Company is entitled to receive from the respective
opponents in any legal proceedings as a result of the awarding of a judicial decision not subject to appeal (<I>decis&atilde;o transitada em julgado</I>). For the avoidance of doubt, any payments made under this Section&nbsp;2.5 (d) shall be
considered, for all purposes, as an adjustment to the Purchase Price. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(e)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">Seller shall be responsible for any costs incurred by the Company regarding its legal representation in the
aforementioned legal proceedings, being entitled to select the legal counselling that the Company shall engage for that purpose, keeping ANI PT duly informed of any relevant actions taken in regard to developments of the proceedings.
</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(f)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Parties agree that the Holdback Amount can be released prior to the Holdback Release Dates in case the
Seller successfully delivers to the Purchaser, as a replacement, an irrevocable and unconditional bank guarantee on first demand, without fixed term, issued by Banco BPI, S.A., covering the payment of the Holdback Amount exactly in the terms set
forth above. The Parties commit to, within 10 Business Days after Closing Date, to agree on the wording of the aforementioned bank guarantee and to submit it to said bank for approval and final issuance. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B></B>2.6</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><B></B><U><B>Holdback Amount</B></U><B><U> Implications</U></B><B> </B></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">The Purchaser has the right but not the obligation, subject to the terms and conditions of this Section&nbsp;2.6, to withhold from the Holdback
Amount and/or the respective Earn Out Payment, if any, an amount equal to the amount of any asserted yet unresolved Claims in connection with or resulting from this Agreement and to set off such withheld amount against amounts for which the
Purchaser has not been fully paid or compensated in respect of such Claims and for which Claims the Purchaser is </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">- 8 - </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always"> </p>
<HR SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">
otherwise entitled to be indemnified by the Seller under this Agreement (the &#147;<B>Claimed <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Set-off</FONT></B>&#148;). To exercise its right of <FONT
STYLE="white-space:nowrap">set-off,</FONT> the Purchaser will give the Seller notice of any Claimed <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Set-off</FONT> (a &#147;<B><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Set-off</FONT> Notice</B>&#148;), which notice will
include reasonable detail as to the basis for and the amount of the Claimed <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Set-off.</FONT> The Seller will have 10 Business Days from the date of receipt of the <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Set-off</FONT> Notice
to object in writing to the Claimed <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Set-off</FONT> (a &#147;<B><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Set-off</FONT> Dispute Notice</B>&#148;). The amount or amounts that are subject to the
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Set-off</FONT> Dispute Notice will be dealt with in accordance with the final resolution of the relevant dispute or disputes. If the Seller fails to provide to the Purchaser a
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Set-off</FONT> Dispute Notice within 10&nbsp;Business Days of receipt of the <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Set-off</FONT> Notice, the Purchaser shall be entitled to withhold and/or
<FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">set-off</FONT> the Claimed <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">Set-off</FONT> without further notice or obligation to the Seller. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>3.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><B><U>CLOSING</U> </B></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">On the date hereof (&#147;<B>Closing Date</B>&#148;), the Company Shares and Credits shall be transferred free
from any and all Encumbrances and together with all rights attached to them from the Seller to the Purchaser including but not limited to the right to receive any dividends which might be allocated to the Company Shares after the Closing Date.
</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">Each Party hereby carry out the list of actions respectively identified in Schedule 3.2. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">3.3</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The transfer of the Company Shares is hereby conducted, by means of the transfer (<I>endosso</I>) and delivery
of the Company Shares to the Purchaser and the performance of all other actions and compliance with all other obligations set out in this Section&nbsp;3 and Schedule 3.2, which shall take place simultaneously (<I>ato</I><I>
</I><I>&uacute;</I><I>nico</I>). </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>4.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><B><U>POST CLOSING</U> </B></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">4.1</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">Following Closing and where so required, </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(a)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">the Seller shall take all such steps as may be reasonably required to provide the Purchaser the full benefit of
the Company and the Business respectively and in order to be able to let the Company conduct the Business as being conducted by the Seller prior to Closing. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(b)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">Parties shall take all reasonable actions necessary and execute any agreements as may be required, to transfer
against nil consideration, those agreements and/or rights belonging to the Business but that were not properly transferred by the Seller to the Company on or prior to Closing. </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt ; font-size:8pt">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman" ALIGN="center">- 9 - </P>

</DIV></Center>


<p style="margin-top:1em; margin-bottom:0em; page-break-before:always"> </p>

<Center><DIV STYLE="width:8.5in" align="left">

<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(c)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">In the event the Seller (inadvertently) receives monies intended for the Company in respect of the Business,
the Seller will remit such funds to Company or the Purchaser (at the Purchaser&#146;s election) forthwith upon receipt thereof. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Seller undertakes to carry out all the actions and agreements listed in Schedule 4.1 (d) within the ten
Business Days after the Closing. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">4.2</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">The Seller shall ensure that (i)&nbsp;any contracts related to the Business that may have been previously
entered into by the Seller will be transferred and/or assigned to the Company and (ii)&nbsp;any and all amounts received under such contract(s) will be promptly transferred to the Company. If and to the extent a counterparty under any such contract
has any objections against the transfer/assignment of its contract to the Company, to the extent permitted under such contract, the Seller shall ensure that it assigns its rights under such contract to the Company in consideration of the Company
acting as subcontractor under such contract and performing all the obligations under such contract. </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TR style = "page-break-inside:avoid">
<TD WIDTH="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left">(a)</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left">make available, or cause to be made available, to the Purchaser and/or the Company, all information, records or
documents which may be reasonably requested by the Purchaser or the Company to fulfil their respective reporting or filing requirements (including in relation to Tax matters); and </P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

that are in their possession or under their control; </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-left:4%; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman">until the expiration of all limitation periods under applicable
Law. </P> <P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; font-family:Times New Roman; font-size:10pt" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

the Second Guarantor as Delegated Director of the Company (administrador-delegado) under the specific title of Chief Executive Officer (CEO). </P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><B>5.</B></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:Times New Roman; " ALIGN="left"><B><U>DUE DILIGENCE</U> </B></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
